title: Gratitude is My Superpower: A children’s book about giving thanks and practicing positivity
description: Little Betsy will learn that happiness is made up of simple things in life, both small and big. With the help of the magic stone, she will begin to feel gratitude for her parents, friends, and toys. But what happens when little Betsy forgets to use the magic of her stone? She will realize that the power of gratitude is hidden in her heart. "Gratitude is my superpower" will teach your little ones to appreciate the warmth of home, time spent playing with friends, and family relationships. Also included Gratitude Journal to improve happiness and gain a new appreciation for your life and life or your children. ••• “Gratitude's in all of us and all we have to do, is stop and think how thankful we are, instead of feeling blue!" ••• This lovely story is filled with charming illustrations and touching rhymes. With this book, you will spend perfect moments with your child. "Gratitude is my superpower" is suitable for kids, their parents, and those who work with children.
author: Alicia Ortego
